text_block_list.name: Karuta Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Both teams have fought their way<n>through three rounds
before meeting<n>in this nail-biter. Which will come out<n>on
top?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Urara, guard!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: (I want to win... I want us to keep<n>going as far as we can!)

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: You got it! There's no getting past<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Karuta Commentator
text_block_list.text:
We're in the first match of the<n>semifinals. Will Team Great
Fortune in<n>the New Year advance to the finals in<n>their first
appearance?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Um, umm, Opera O! L-left, two-two!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: It shall be mine. Hahhh!

text_block_list.name: Male Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
Wow... This team is the real deal!<n>They might actually win it
all!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: That's it, everybody! Keep it up! Wecan win. We will win!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Fuku, raising her voice? You must be<n>super fired up!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Well, it's a big room! I'll shout till I'm<n>hoarse if I need to!

text_block_list.name: Female Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Hehe... You know, they're kind of<n>adorable. You can tell
they're trying so<n>hard, it makes you want to cheer for<n>
them.

text_block_list.name: Karuta Commentator
text_block_list.text:
And that's it! Advancing to the finals<n>will be Team Great
Fortune in the New<n>Year!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: GyeaAHHHH! W-we did it guys!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: ...Hm? Wait, what?!

text_block_list.name: Female Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Okay, that match was crazy. NowI kind of want to watch them race too!

text_block_list.name: Female Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Same! But... one of them seemed a<n>little off earlier, don't
you think?

text_block_list.name: Male Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Dude, did you hear? Apparently the<n>rosters might change
for this<n>afternoon's final.

text_block_list.name: Male Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Wait, why? Was there trouble?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ngh... You guys... I'm so sor—cough,cough!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Wh-whoa, Fuku! You shouldn't be<n>talking!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: You don't need to apologize... Youwere giving out orders andcheering us on. That must've beenhard on your voice...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
We don't have anyone who can<n>swap in for you, so... It's
sad, but I<n>guess we just have to forfeit the<n>finals...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ooh... It's all my fault isn't it...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I got so excited about winning I let<n>myself go and... Ugh, we
were doing<n>so well together too...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
D-don't blame yourself like that...<n>O-oh, hey, remember what
you told<n>us?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Having fun is what matters most. We<n>accomplished that
just by<n>participating. Isn't that enough?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Just... just partici...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Just participating is enough? Cough,cough! I know I said that—I believedit!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Which means, if we all enter the<n>karuta tournament together,
then win<n>or lose, good fortune will be ours!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
As long as we all take part and have<n>fun, everyone goes
home happy!<n>That's what she wanted to get<n>across, if
you ask me!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
But... wouldn't winning make you<n>happy?! Making fun a
priority isn't the<n>same thing as not trying at all.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
It's because we tried that we had so<n>much fun! But just
when I finally<n>started to understand that, I...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Wahhh, I'm such a nincompoop! I<n>just wish you guys could
compete in<n>the finals, even if it was without me...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
If only... we had someone, anyone,<n>who could sub in for
me...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Now seems a good time as any.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
My friends, what if I were to tell you<n>there is indeed a way
out of this<n>predicament?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
As Fukukitaru just said, we are in<n>need of a messenger
from Victory<n>herself, nothing less than a savior!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Come on out now—your moment hasarrived! You are here, aren't you,Ayabe?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...Still haven't learned your indoor<n>voice, I see.
